actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 10 of the Act of August 4, 1976 (90 Stat. 1090) the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1975.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1975 to extend for an additional year the deadline for the Office of Technology Assessment study of Federal coal leasing to be undertaken pursuant to such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 10 of the Act of August 4, 1976 (90 Stat. 1090) the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1975.
